pkgmetadata.longdescription: # markdown-it-reporterBuild Markdown based HTML reports from Github flavored Markdown using the markdown-it library... _Galaxy: http://galaxyproject.org/.. _GitHub: https://github.com/History-------.. to_doc---------------------0.0.2 (2020-08-21)---------------------* Implement customizable masthead links.---------------------0.0.1 (2020-08-18)---------------------* Initial version - still testing it.
